sentences.en: A stout tailwind was giving a friendly boost.
sentences.cn: 一股强劲的顺风正在给予有利的推动.

sentences.en: Equip yourself with stout walking boots and sticks.
sentences.cn: 你自己要准备好结实的步行靴和拐杖。

sentences.en: He cut a stout stick to help him walk.
sentences.cn: 他砍了一根结实的枝条用来拄着走路.

sentences.en: He put up a stout defence in court.
sentences.cn: 他在法庭上进行了顽强的抗辩。

sentences.en: He was a tall, stout man with gray hair.
sentences.cn: 他是个又高又胖、头发灰白的男子。

sentences.en: I was sandwiched between two very stout men in the bus.
sentences.cn: 我在公共汽车上被夹在两个非常健壮的人之间.

sentences.en: If he's stout of heart, you must be stouter.
sentences.cn: 要是人家心狠, 你就得更狠.

sentences.en: Jacobs was a stout, florid man.
sentences.cn: 雅各布斯身材结实，脸色红润。

sentences.en: The invasion was held up by unexpectedly stout resistance.
sentences.cn: 入侵行动因遭遇到了出乎意料的顽强抵抗而受阻。

sentences.en: The old man picked up a stout stick that lay by his feet.
sentences.cn: 老头捡起脚边的一根粗棍子。

sentences.en: The stout barman in a bow tie presented himself to take their order. "Good morning, sir. The usual?"
sentences.cn: 那名打着领结的矮胖酒吧招待走上前来请他们点餐.“早上好,先生们.还是平常那些吗?”

sentences.en: The stout old man waddled across the road.
sentences.cn: 那肥胖的老人一跩一跩地穿过马路.

sentences.en: This is the time for stout fellows to prove their worth!
sentences.cn: 这正是男子汉发奋有为之时!

trans.tran_cn: 强壮的，结实的，勇敢的，坚定的
trans.tran_en: fairly fat and heavy, or having a thick body

trans.tran_cn: 烈性黑啤酒，胖子，特大号
